TextBlock.Text: MALLOW: Imagine, Privet: the <color=orange>Probe Tracking Module</color> will be the first to know the coordinates of the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color>! You’ll be the first to see them!
PRIVET: I am honored and terrified!
PRIVET: You won’t ask the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> to use so much power that it breaks, will you?
MALLOW: Fret not, my nervous friend! We only need to fire the probe once, anyway, so who minds if it compromises the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color>’s structural integrity slightly?
PRIVET: I would mind, Mallow! I would mind, because we won’t be capable of receiving our probe’s data if the <color=orange>Probe Tracking Module</color> is destroyed!
